languages.text: Мобильный добывающий форпост, произведенный согласно благословенной Стандартной Шаблонной Конструкции. Небольшой промышленный комплекс может быть развернут практически на любом, сколь угодно негостеприимном мире. Клан серфов, прикрепленный к нему, посвятит жизнь обслуживанию священных механизмов и добыче ресурсов, в которых нуждается Вольный Торговец.

A mobile mining outpost assembled in accordance with the blessed Standard Template Construct. This small industrial complex can be deployed on practically any world, however inhospitable. The serf clan assigned to it will devote itself to the maintenance of its sacred mechanisms and the extraction of resources needed by the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Мобильный добывающий форпост, произведенный согласно благословенной Стандартной Шаблонной Конструкции. Небольшой промышленный комплекс может быть развернут практически на любом, сколь угодно негостеприимном мире. Клан серфов, прикрепленный к нему, посвятит жизнь обслуживанию священных механизмов и добыче ресурсов, в которых нуждается Вольный Торговец.

traits.locale_text: A mobile mining outpost assembled in accordance with the blessed Standard Construction Template. This small industrial complex can be deployed on practically any world, however inhospitable. The serf clan assigned to it will devote itself to the maintenance of its sacred mechanisms and the extraction of the resources that the Rogue Trader has need of.

A mobile mining outpost assembled in accordance with the blessed Standard Construction Template. This small industrial complex can be deployed on practically any world, however inhospitable. The serf clan assigned to it will devote itself to the maintenance of its sacred mechanisms and the extraction of the resources that the Rogue Trader has need of.

The serf clan assigned to it will devote itself to the maintenance of its sacred mechanisms and the extraction of resources needed by the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Un puesto minero móvil armado de acuerdo con la bendita plantilla de construcción estándar. Este pequeño complejo industrial se puede desplegar en prácticamente cualquier planeta, sin importar lo inhóspito que sea. El clan de plebeyos asignado se dedicará al mantenimiento de sus sagrados mecanismos y a la extracción de recursos para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: A mobile mining outpost assembled in accordance with the blessed Standard Template Construct. This small industrial complex can be deployed on practically any world, however inhospitable. The serf clan assigned to it will devote itself to the maintenance of its sacred mechanisms and the extraction of resources needed by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Un puesto minero móvil armado de acuerdo con la bendita plantilla de construcción estándar. Este pequeño complejo industrial se puede desplegar en prácticamente cualquier planeta, sin importar lo inhóspito que sea. El clan de plebeyos asignado se dedicará al mantenimiento de sus sagrados mecanismos y a la extracción de recursos para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Un avant-poste minier mobile assemblé conformément aux préceptes sacrés du Schéma de Construction Standardisé. Ce petit complexe industriel peut être déployé sur quasiment toutes les planètes, même les plus inhospitalières. Le clan de serfs chargé des opérations sur place assurera la maintenance de ses mécanismes bénis et l'extraction des ressources dont {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a besoin.
languages.original_text: A mobile mining outpost assembled in accordance with the blessed Standard Template Construct. This small industrial complex can be deployed on practically any world, however inhospitable. The serf clan assigned to it will devote itself to the maintenance of its sacred mechanisms and the extraction of resources needed by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Un avant-poste minier mobile assemblé conformément aux préceptes sacrés du Schéma de Construction Standardisé. Ce petit complexe industriel peut être déployé sur quasiment toutes les planètes, même les plus inhospitalières. Le clan de serfs chargé des opérations sur place assurera la maintenance de ses mécanismes bénis et l'extraction des ressources dont {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a besoin.

languages.text: 按照受祝福的标准建造模板建造的移动采矿前哨站。这个小型工业综合中心几乎可以部署到任何世界，无论环境多么荒蛮。分配到该建筑的仆役氏族将终生勤勉地维护其神圣的运作机制，同时开采行商浪人所需的一切资源。
languages.original_text: A mobile mining outpost assembled in accordance with the blessed Standard Template Construct. This small industrial complex can be deployed on practically any world, however inhospitable. The serf clan assigned to it will devote itself to the maintenance of its sacred mechanisms and the extraction of resources needed by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 按照受祝福的标准建造模板建造的移动采矿前哨站。这个小型工业综合中心几乎可以部署到任何世界，无论环境多么荒蛮。分配到该建筑的仆役氏族将终生勤勉地维护其神圣的运作机制，同时开采行商浪人所需的一切资源。

languages.text: 祝福された標準テンプレート構造に従って、移動式採掘前哨拠点が組み立てられた。この小規模な工業施設は、いかに人を寄せ付けない世界であろうとも配置することができる。配属された農奴の一党は、神聖な機構の維持とローグトレーダーが必要とする資源の採取に専念することになる。
languages.original_text: A mobile mining outpost assembled in accordance with the blessed Standard Template Construct. This small industrial complex can be deployed on practically any world, however inhospitable. The serf clan assigned to it will devote itself to the maintenance of its sacred mechanisms and the extraction of resources needed by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 祝福された標準テンプレート構造に従って、移動式採掘前哨拠点が組み立てられた。この小規模な工業施設は、いかに人を寄せ付けない世界であろうとも配置することができる。配属された農奴の一党は、神聖な機構の維持とローグトレーダーが必要とする資源の採取に専念することになる。

languages.text: Ein mobiler Bergbauaußenposten, der im Einklang mit dem gesegneten Standardtechnologiekonstrukt errichtet wurde. Dieser kleine industrielle Komplex kann auf nahezu jeder Welt eingesetzt werden, so unwirtlich sie auch sein mag. Der Sklavenclan, der ihm zugewiesen wird, widmet sich der Wartung seiner heiligen Mechanismen und der Extraktion der Ressourcen, welche {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} benötigt.
languages.original_text: A mobile mining outpost assembled in accordance with the blessed Standard Template Construct. This small industrial complex can be deployed on practically any world, however inhospitable. The serf clan assigned to it will devote itself to the maintenance of its sacred mechanisms and the extraction of resources needed by the Rogue Trader.

Dieser kleine industrielle Komplex kann auf nahezu jeder Welt eingesetzt werden, so unwirtlich sie auch sein mag. languages.text: Kutsal Standart Şablon Yapısı'na uygun olarak imal edilen bir gezici maden karakolu. Bu küçük sanayi kompleksi, koşulları ne kadar elverişsiz olursa olsun hemen hemen her dünyaya konuşlandırılabilir. Komplekste çalışmak üzere görevlendirilen serf klanı, kendisini kutsal mekanizmalarının bakımına ve Hür Tacir'in ihtiyaç duyduğu kaynakların çıkarılmasına adayacaktır.
languages.original_text: A mobile mining outpost assembled in accordance with the blessed Standard Template Construct. This small industrial complex can be deployed on practically any world, however inhospitable. The serf clan assigned to it will devote itself to the maintenance of its sacred mechanisms and the extraction of resources needed by the Rogue Trader.
